statements: SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, geographical_coordinates FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT landmark_name FROM landmarks WHERE geographical_coordinates IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_landmarks FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT landmark_name FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT landmark_name FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE ST_DWithin(geographical_coordinates, 'POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)', 0.01);
SELECT * FROM landmarks
SELECT landmark_name, landmark_description FROM landmarks
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE continent='Europe'
SELECT country_name, continent FROM countries
SELECT landmark_name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT landmark_name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;

SELECT country_name, continent, COUNT(landmark_id) AS total_landmarks FROM countries c LEFT JOIN landmarks l ON c.country_id = l.country_id GROUP BY country_name, continent ORDER BY total_landmarks DESC;
SELECT l.landmark_name, c.country_name FROM landmarks l JOIN countries c ON l.country_id = c.country_id WHERE l.latitude < 40 AND c.continent = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT landmark_id, landmark_name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name ASC;
SELECT country_name, count(visit_id) as total_visits FROM countries c JOIN visits v ON c.country_id = v.country_id GROUP BY country_name;
SELECT landmark_name, landmark_description FROM landmarks WHERE latitude BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

SELECT c.country_name, l.landmark_name FROM visits v JOIN countries c ON v.country_id = c.country_id JOIN landmarks l ON v.landmark_id = l.landmark_id ORDER BY c.country_name ASC, l.landmark_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT landmark_name, landmark_description FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name ASC;
SELECT l.landmark_name, c.country_name FROM landmarks AS l JOIN countries AS c ON l.landmark_id = c.country_id;
SELECT count(*), AVG(latitude), AVG(longitude) FROM landmarks GROUP BY landmark_id HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM visits WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM landmarks;
SELECT country_name, continent FROM countries ORDER BY continent ASC;
SELECT city_name, country_name FROM cities WHERE city_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE city_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE city_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT landmark_name, location FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_id = 2;
SELECT city_name, country_name FROM cities INNER JOIN countries ON cities.country_id = countries.country_id;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE location = '(22.56, 41.89)';
SELECT city_name, users.username FROM cities INNER JOIN users ON cities.city_id = users.city_id;
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT id, name, description FROM landmarks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 10000000 ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT id, name, area FROM regions WHERE landmarks_count < 5 ORDER BY area ASC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT name, description FROM landmarks WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population > 10000000 ORDER BY area DESC
SELECT name, area FROM regions WHERE landmarks_count > 10 ORDER BY area ASC
SELECT l.name AS landmark_name, v.visit_date FROM visits v JOIN landmarks l ON v.landmark_id = l.id WHERE v.visitor_id = 5
